mapper.select: select * from store order by order_cnt desc
mapper.insert: insert into store values(#{crNum}, #{secretCode}, #{storeName}, #{storeCategory}, #{storeAddr}, #{storeTel}, #{storeEmail}, #{opentime}, #{storeInfo}, default, default)
mapper.update: update store set store_name = #{storeName}, secret_code = #{secretCode}, store_category = #{storeCategory}, store_addr = #{storeAddr}, store_tel = #{storeTel}, store_email = #{storeEmail}, opentime = #{opentime}, store_info = #{storeInfo} where cr_num = #{crNum}
mapper.delete: delete from owner_store where cr_num = #{crNum} and owner_id = #{ownerId}
